title: Urgent Opening For React.js Developer
location: Pune, Pune, Maharastra, India, 411001 Post Date: 24 Apr,2023Last Date to Apply: 28 Apr,2023
job_discription:
1. Meeting with the development team to discuss user interface ideas and applications.
2. Reviewing application requirements and interface designs.

3. Developing and implementing highly responsive user interface components using react concepts.
4. Writing application interface codes using JavaScript following react.js workflows.
5. Troubleshooting interface software and debugging application codes.
6. Developing and implementing front-end architecture to support user interface concepts.
7. Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use.
8. Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers.
9. Documenting application changes and developing updates.
10. Install and configure server environments for React deployments


• An understanding of common programming paradigms and fundamental React principles, such as React components, hooks, and the React lifecycle. • Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model, CSS, HTML, and front-end languages. • Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles. • Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux). • Familiarity with newer specifications of ECMAScript. • Experience with data structure libraries (e.g., Immutable.js). • Knowledge of isomorphic React is a plus. • Familiarity with RESTful APIs, GraphQL APIs. • Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token. • Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools. • Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc. • Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements. • A knack for benchmarking and optimization. • Familiarity with code versioning tools.

job_discription:
Job description for Database developers having Postgres or MySQL Database expertise/database development ( Core SQL) These both are mandatory skills to be checked
 
Exp 2-4Yrs max
Location Noida

* Create Stored Procedures, Functions, Triggers, etc.
* Process data migration to Postgres, SQL Server, and Oracle from various sources
* Verify and execute scripts developed by teams in Staging and Production environments
* Diagnose and resolve production issues
* Design, test and deploy database schemas

Exposure to database design methodologies
Good problem-solving abilities
Good written and verbal communication skills
Ability to work in a team and individually
Good team Player

* Ability to write SQL scripts for data migration from sources like excel, MS Access, CSV/text file, etc.
* Should be able to troubleshoot SQL queries for performance tuning
* Skilled at optimizing significant complicated SQL statements
 
Desirable:
 
* Experience in short release cycles & complete software life cycle.
* Entire SDLC knowledge
* Demonstrated problem-solving, analytic, and troubleshooting skills.
* Familiar with tools that can aid with profiling server resource usage and optimizing it

Hive queries for data analysis

job_discription:
1. Meeting with the development team to discuss user interface ideas and applications.
2. Reviewing application requirements and interface designs.

3. Developing and implementing highly responsive user interface components using react concepts.

5. Troubleshooting interface software and debugging application codes.

title: Ai Developer
location: 5th Floor, Plot No.-15 Techzone -4, Greater Noida , Noida, Uttar Pradesh, India, 201309 Post Date: 06 Jul,2023Last Date to Apply: 31 Aug,2023
job_discription:
We at Link8 are seeking a highly skilled and motivated AI Developer to join our team. As an AI Developer, you will be responsible for leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) technologies and algorithms to enhance our business processes, automate workflows, and improve decision-making. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement AI solutions tailored to our specific needs.

Responsibilities:

- Design and develop AI models and algorithms to automate business processes.
- Implement natural language processing (NLP) techniques.
- Build machine learning models to predictive analysis and performance based on historical data and key indicators.
- Develop chatbots or virtual assistants to provide personalized engagement and support throughout the business process.
- Integrate AI-driven tools and technologies into our platforms to optimize efficiency, data collection, and decision-making.
- Collaborate with internal teams, data scientists, and stakeholders to understand requirements and identify AI opportunities within the recruitment ecosystem.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI technologies, machine learning, and NLP to bring innovative solutions to our business processes.
- Conduct research and experiments to improve existing AI models and algorithms, striving for continuous optimization.
- Participate in code reviews, testing, and documentation to ensure high-quality and maintainable AI solutions.

Qualifications:

- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field.
- Proven experience as an AI Developer or in a similar role, with a focus on recruitment-related projects.
- Strong programming skills in languages such as Python, R, or Java.
- Solid understanding of machine learning algorithms, NLP techniques, and statistical models.
- Experience with AI frameworks and libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, Keras, scikit-learn) and NLP tools (e.g., NLTK, SpaCy).
- Proficiency in working with large datasets, data preprocessing, and feature engineering.
- Familiarity with recruitment platforms, ATS (Applicant Tracking Systems), and HR technology is a plus.
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills with a keen attention to detail.
- Strong communication and collaboration abilities to work effectively in a cross-functional team environment.
- Proactive mindset with a passion for staying updated with the latest AI advancements and technologies.

Join our dynamic team and contribute to revolutionizing our ecosystem with cutting-edge AI technologies. Apply now

1. Meeting with the development team to discuss user interface ideas and applications.

title: Ai Developer
location: 5th Floor, Plot No.-15 Techzone -4, Greater Noida , Noida, Uttar Pradesh, India, 201309 Post Date: 06 Jul,2023Last Date to Apply: 31 Aug,2023
job_discription:
We at Link8 are seeking a highly skilled and motivated AI Developer to join our team. As an AI Developer, you will be responsible for leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) technologies and algorithms to enhance our business processes, automate workflows, and improve decision-making. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement AI solutions tailored to our specific needs.

Responsibilities:

- Design and develop AI models and algorithms to automate business processes.
- Implement natural language processing (NLP) techniques.
- Build machine learning models to predictive analysis and performance based on historical data and key indicators.
- Develop chatbots or virtual assistants to provide personalized engagement and support throughout the business process.
- Integrate AI-driven tools and technologies into our platforms to optimize efficiency, data collection, and decision-making.
- Collaborate with internal teams, data scientists, and stakeholders to understand requirements and identify AI opportunities within the recruitment ecosystem.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI technologies, machine learning, and NLP to bring innovative solutions to our business processes.
- Conduct research and experiments to improve existing AI models and algorithms, striving for continuous optimization.
- Participate in code reviews, testing, and documentation to ensure high-quality and maintainable AI solutions.

Qualifications:

- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field.
- Proven experience as an AI Developer or in a similar role, with a focus on recruitment-related projects.
- Strong programming skills in languages such as Python, R, or Java.
- Solid understanding of machine learning algorithms, NLP techniques, and statistical models.
- Experience with AI frameworks and libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, Keras, scikit-learn) and NLP tools (e.g., NLTK, SpaCy).
- Proficiency in working with large datasets, data preprocessing, and feature engineering.
- Familiarity with recruitment platforms, ATS (Applicant Tracking Systems), and HR technology is a plus.
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills with a keen attention to detail.
- Strong communication and collaboration abilities to work effectively in a cross-functional team environment.
- Proactive mindset with a passion for staying updated with the latest AI advancements and technologies.

Join our dynamic team and contribute to revolutionizing our ecosystem with cutting-edge AI technologies. Apply now

title: Ai Developer
location: 5th Floor, Plot No.-15 Techzone -4, Greater Noida , Noida, Uttar Pradesh, India, 201309 Post Date: 06 Jul,2023Last Date to Apply: 31 Aug,2023
job_discription:
We at Link8 are seeking a highly skilled and motivated AI Developer to join our team. As an AI Developer, you will be responsible for leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) technologies and algorithms to enhance our business processes, automate workflows, and improve decision-making. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement AI solutions tailored to our specific needs.

Responsibilities:

- Design and develop AI models and algorithms to automate business processes.
- Implement natural language processing (NLP) techniques.
- Build machine learning models to predictive analysis and performance based on historical data and key indicators.
- Develop chatbots or virtual assistants to provide personalized engagement and support throughout the business process.
- Integrate AI-driven tools and technologies into our platforms to optimize efficiency, data collection, and decision-making.
- Collaborate with internal teams, data scientists, and stakeholders to understand requirements and identify AI opportunities within the recruitment ecosystem.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI technologies, machine learning, and NLP to bring innovative solutions to our business processes.
- Conduct research and experiments to improve existing AI models and algorithms, striving for continuous optimization.
- Participate in code reviews, testing, and documentation to ensure high-quality and maintainable AI solutions.

Qualifications:

- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field.
- Proven experience as an AI Developer or in a similar role, with a focus on recruitment-related projects.
- Strong programming skills in languages such as Python, R, or Java.
- Solid understanding of machine learning algorithms, NLP techniques, and statistical models.
- Experience with AI frameworks and libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, Keras, scikit-learn) and NLP tools (e.g., NLTK, SpaCy).
- Proficiency in working with large datasets, data preprocessing, and feature engineering.
- Familiarity with recruitment platforms, ATS (Applicant Tracking Systems), and HR technology is a plus.
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills with a keen attention to detail.
- Strong communication and collaboration abilities to work effectively in a cross-functional team environment.
- Proactive mindset with a passion for staying updated with the latest AI advancements and technologies.

Join our dynamic team and contribute to revolutionizing our ecosystem with cutting-edge AI technologies. Apply now

Company Brief:
 
Dsoft Innovation LLP presents “Freedeem”a unique mobile application platform for the brick and mortar retail stores to showcase their offers or deals for the consumers, enabling them to get the best deal and thereby creating a win-win situation for both businesses as well as consumers. This app will create a disruption in the Offline Retail Markets, enabling Retailers to interact with their consumers by means of offers, deals and scheme. Dsoft Innovation LLP is based in Ahmedabad, a sister concern of DSoft Infotech Pvt.Ltd which is a software product company with more than 500+ man years of IT experience and 20+ years of rich insights into the Jewellery & Accounting industry.  ORNATE – a complete ERP solution for jewellery business management – has been developed by Dsoft Infotech, headquartered at Rajkot, Gujarat, India. Dsoft was the first company to develop business accounting and management solution “Profit nx” in regional language in 1992. Experience of serving more than 1,25,000 users with vernacular language has been most useful to Team Profit. Company Brief:
 
Dsoft Innovation LLP presents “Freedeem”a unique mobile application platform for the brick and mortar retail stores to showcase their offers or deals for the consumers, enabling them to get the best deal and thereby creating a win-win situation for both businesses as well as consumers. This app will create a disruption in the Offline Retail Markets, enabling Retailers to interact with their consumers by means of offers, deals and scheme. job_discription:
Position: Senior PHP Developer

Job Description:
Required well experienced Sr. PHP developer having strong control over PHP. Must required Laravel framework knowledge on the top, other frameworks like CakePHP  or Codeigniter will be advantage. Should have sound knowledge of current web development technologies including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, etc. Strong knowledge of MYSQL and relational databases, version control tools and of developing web services. Knowledge of UI Framework (Angular) will be additional advantage. Should have ability to put the requirements into efficient coding with general best practices guidelines. Knowledge of Amazon AWS Services (EC2,S3,...) will be an additional advantage.

Technical Skills: Expertise required in PHP, Mysql, Laravel, Codeigniter, CakePHP, Angular etc.
 
Eligibility Criteria: any graduate or master, associate’s degree in software development. Candidates having work exposure in Current Web Development technologies is preferable.

Experience: 5 to 7 years

CTC Package: 10 to 12 LPA
 
Senior PHP Developer Profile:  Senior Developer will be contribute in complete Web development life cycle like Requirement gathering, understanding & analysis, system design and development, manual unit testing and deployments. Generate proper documentations in all phase of development life cycle. Strong knowledge of SDLC methodologies - ideally Agile should be able to analyze and resolve performance bottlenecks. Hands-on design, coding & development. Require to update technical knowledge, conduct R & D, trouble shooting etc. on regular basis.
 
Company Brief:
 
Dsoft Innovation LLP presents “Freedeem”a unique mobile application platform for the brick and mortar retail stores to showcase their offers or deals for the consumers, enabling them to get the best deal and thereby creating a win-win situation for both businesses as well as consumers. This app will create a disruption in the Offline Retail Markets, enabling Retailers to interact with their consumers by means of offers, deals and scheme. Apart from that, retailers will be able to effectively combat competition from online market places by retaining the clients within their local market place.
 
Dsoft Innovation LLP is based in Ahmedabad, a sister concern of DSoft Infotech Pvt.Ltd which is a software product company with more than 500+ man years of IT experience and 20+ years of rich insights into the Jewellery & Accounting industry.  ORNATE – a complete ERP solution for jewellery business management – has been developed by Dsoft Infotech, headquartered at Rajkot, Gujarat, India. Dsoft was the first company to develop business accounting and management solution “Profit nx” in regional language in 1992. Experience of serving more than 1,25,000 users with vernacular language has been most useful to Team Profit. Over a period of time, the company has earned the distinction of being trusted by leading jewelers across 160+ cities in India, USA, UK, Africa, UAE and Sri Lanka. Sister concern web URL: www.ornatesoftware.com /www.profitnx.ae
 
Company Web URL:www.freedeem.in

job_discription:
1. Position : Manager Electrical

3. Experience : 15-20 Years

4. Posting at : Murthal (Sonipat) Plant

5. Salary : 60-70 K per month

RESPONSIBILITIES:
1. Attend electrical break down entire factory premises.
2. Ensure proper supply of power to all departments without any loss of production and also in the
administration block.
3. Preventive maintenance of all electrical equipments including panels.
4. Improvement in power factor and reducing the electricity bill.
5. Inspection of all incoming electrical items.
6. Ensure economic and efficient running of DG sets.
7. Proper recording of consumption of DG/Power / other related spares.
8. Monitor and compare power generation cost with State Electricity Board power cost.
9. Submission of process cost information to the management.

fans, Insect Killers, tube lights etc.
13. Down time analysis.
14. Departmental discipline, control of absenteeism and handling worker grievances.
15. Giving continuous attention on improving systems.
16. Assisting VP Technical in solving day to day problems.
17. Listing departmental grievance and resolution.
18. Maintaining discipline in department.
19. Maintaining Good Manufacturing and Good Hygiene practice in department.
20. Ensure applicable Personal protective Equipment usage in department.
21. Identification of training needs, relieving staff for training & verification of training effectiveness.
22. Ensure safe working condition in department.
23. Compliance of Food Safety Management System requirements.
24. Fork Lift smooth running and their maintenance; also provide separate Fork Lift to each
department in Plant.
25. Ensure smooth running of all utilities.

location: Bangalore, India, Post Date: 27 Feb,2021Last Date to Apply: 10 Mar,2021
job_discription:
Fiercely allegiant to outcomes. Finds the right talent, tools and solution to solve a business problem.
Able to make hard decisions on talent, tools and deliverables and able to articulate the reason with a wide audience.
Desire to communicate with US leads and communicate bad news early and often.
Expert level experience in hand writing SQL queries within relational databases.
Experience in noSQL databases (Cassandra, Couchbase, MongoDB) and ability to think between relational and non relational data and ETL processes to transform from one to another.
Experience in Git (preferably Github), Bitbucket or other modern code repositories.
Exposure to automation/build tools like Maven, Jenkins, CI, CloudFormation and others
4-5 years of hands on programming experience in the Java technology stack.
3-4 years of experience in designing and developing RESTful web services.
4 years of experience in relational (MYSQL, Oracle, SQL Server and non-relational data stores..
 
Roles and Responsibilities
 
Define and refine technical architecture plans to meet client needs.
Work closely to define scope, effort and release plan for time sensitive deliverables.
Evaluate complexity, need and tools against deliverable timelines to right size the development effort.
Absolute desire and need to get involved in hands-on coding.
Mentor a development team and execute independently on defined deliverables.
Architect solutions (SQL to noSQL, queuing, messaging, SSO) for SaaS products with long term vision and help drive the cradle to grave implementations.
Architect RESTful services using Java/J2EE (Spring, MyBatis, RabbitMQ)
Ability to build services to support Single Page Applications (SPAs) on the front-end (micro-services, partial and frequent data pulls, quick execution, etc.)

Build applications that are deployed in cloud stack AWS with ElasticBeanStalk, Github, BrowserStack, Continuous Integration and delivery (CI/D)
